description:
Made from Repreve recycled polyester and paired with Arcade’s updated buckle, this belt it keeps your pants up wherever you're headed, whatever you're doing. Goes with your snow pants, jeans or fancy pants. Yes, it really is that versatile.

  • Slimmed down version fits through smaller belt loops
  • Stretchy elastic webbing uses Repreve® recycled polyester (85%), is super comfy, and does away with finding the perfect hole
  • Updated buckle design curves with your body, offers even smoother operation, better retention, and improved durability
  • Buckle allows for precise adjustment, is easy to open and close, and won’t pinch while you play
  • Metal-free design is great for travel – no need to take it off at the airport
  • One-size design fits up to 40in. waists
  • Machine washable in case of spillage
name: Arcade Sierra Slim - Unisex
